Text: Don't know why it's called "Pro", I've tried it & it sucks. You get better quality from standard mp3, probably because you're limited to 96kbps with "Pro".

MP3PRo is "better sound" (according to nero)
AT A LOWER BIT RATE
To tell the truth i didnt find t very usful myself

Been a while since I Tried it so just gone back & did an experiment.
Using the track "NIN-Everyday is exactly the same" I encoded using "mp3Pro" & "Lame mp3 encoder" & have come to the conclusion I was right in the first place "mp3Pro" sucks.
Even at 96kbps "Lame" is better although I would recommend 192kbps

and somehow lots of ppl need it for want it

a word of advice

dont buy the mp3pro plugin download it here

Mp3pro are better than mp3.
For a MP3 224 kbit/s the equivalent is 96 kbit/s in Mp3pro. For 1/2 size of files and the same quality.

Search & Learn before talk...
